thread.title: BRIEF-City of London Files Lawsuit Against The China Fund and its Board

title: BRIEF-City of London Files Lawsuit Against The China Fund and its Board

organizations.name: brief-city of london files lawsuit against the china
brief-city of london files lawsuit against the china fund

text:
April 2, 2018 / 4:34 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-City of London Files Lawsuit Against The China Fund and its Board Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - City Of London Investment Management: 
* FILED COMPLAINT IN COURT BRINGING CLAIMS AGAINST CHINA FUND & MEMBERS OF ITS BOARD 
* FILED COMPLAINT RELATED TO CHINA FUNDâ€™S POSTPONEMENT OF ITS 2018 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO APRIL 26, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
